# RecognizedItem.text(_:)

**Case**

Text or data the analyzer detects in text.

## Declaration

```swift
case text(RecognizedItem.Text)
```

## Parameters

- **Text**: The recognized text item.

## Text items

- **RecognizedItem.Text**: An object that represents a text item that the scanner recognizes.

items.description: An object that represents a text item that the scanner recognizes.
items.name: RecognizedItem.Text
